# Generating Support Bundles

This topic describes how to generate support bundles. It includes procedures for Helm installations and KOTS installations.

## Generate a Bundle Using the CLI

### Prerequisite: Install the Plugin

<InstallPlugin/>

### Generate a Bundle

<GenerateBundle/>

### Generate a Bundle with a Default Spec

Replicated provides default support bundle specifications that you can use to generate support bundles when an installation fails or when the application does not include a support bundles spec.

#### Default Spec for Helm Installations

If a Helm installation fails and you want to collect a support bundle to assist with diagnostics, you can use a default specification to generate the support bundle.

Run the following command:

```
kubectl support-bundle https://raw.githubusercontent.com/replicatedhq/troubleshoot-specs/main/in-cluster/default.yaml
```

#### KOTS Default Spec (KOTS Only)

<GenerateBundleDefaultKots/>
